reviewText: Loved the video and this is even better because you can go directly to the candy cane factory.
My kids love this movie! Now we don't have to check if out from the library again and again.
My son has been loving this DVD since he was 4 months old. now he's 2.5 and still likes to watch it.

We don't own it, we watch it on demand from our cable. im going to buy it for her because she LOVES it. its the only brainy baby she likes. she will be really fussy and as soon as this is turned on, its all smiles and giggles! we replay and replay it for her when we are trying to get things done like dinner.

We have all of the Brainy Baby dvd's and the others don't really hold my 14 month old daughter's attention for very long but the Jingle Bells dvd is a sure thing!! She is obsessed with it and if I let her watch it over and over and over and over again, she would.  I  wish they made another dvd like this one!! She loves the music and the shiny ornaments and christmas lights. The sneak peaks of Santa are really cute and the bit on how candy canes are made is even interesting for us adults! This dvd is stimulating and also educational .
Another great choice with a Christmas twist to the captivating series from Brainy Baby.  My 14 month old loves this one as much as the others.

What a cute DVD! my children love the music, the "playing in the snow" scenes, counting ornaments and toy train cars, leaving cookies for Santa, etc, and they get a thrill out of watching for the "sneak peeks" of Santa throughout the program. It says "baby", but my toddler AND my preschooler like it. We've already watched it dozens of times!
